Sentence: David befriends and idolizes an egotistical young man named James Steerforth
On his (David) way to Yarmouth, David encounters James Steerforth, and they take a detour to visit Steerforth's mother
Word reaches David, through Steerforth, that Mr
Steerforth's ward, summons David and informs him (David) that Steerforth has left Little Em'ly
